dialogue:
[header name:Helpful Elder]
Here is a [color value:blue]pack[color value:regular][sprite id:pack/scale:.7]for you, young one.

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:Helpful Elder]
You can look at your collected packs 
[color value:blue]with E[color value:regular] 
and open them if you [color value:blue]hold F
[color value:regular].

[newpage wait:3]
[header name:Helpful Elder]
Its important to choose which cards to 
[color value:red]efcsume[color value:regular] 
and which to add to [color value:blue]
your buffer[color value:regular].
name: Elder 1
